cells.content:
// add new item to the ordered set
ZADD game 50 ahmed

// get score of member
ZSCORE game ahmed

// get score of member
ZSCORE game ahmed

DEL game

ZADD products 100 cpu
ZADD products 10 keyboard
ZADD products 33 power

// will git number of members in the products
ZCARD products

// will remove the max value an return it
ZPOPMAX products

// will remove the min value an return it
ZPOPMIN products

DEL game

ZADD products 100 cpu
ZADD products 10 keyboard
ZADD products 33 power
ZADD products 55 headset
ZADD products 96 ibad
ZADD products 33 labtop

// will remove the to 3 scores and return them
ZPOPMAX products 3

// will update score of the member
ZINCRBY products 150 power

// Rev will reverse the responce
ZRANGE products 0 1 WITHSCORES REV

// Limit (skip - limit)
  ZRANGE products 0 100 BYSCORE LIMIT 1 2
